response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is priced at $950,000. Given its worth to you, I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability.
